text.text_translated:
Chloe came home from school. She made a cup of coffee. She took it to her bedroom.

She had some homework. But she could do it later. She wanted a quiet hour before her parents came home. Then the house was noisy. They talked and watched TV. Her dad cooked dinner. He listened to his jazz music. He loved this music.

Chloe liked this quiet time. She liked it because she could play with her pet rats.
